1.Title: Scorching Breath
1.Description: Upon hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>3.5%</color> for 8s, stacking up to 8 times. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
